attributes.title: Do not recommend🤢
attributes.review: This app is trash there is nothing good about it this app is sooo fake. This is not the official app of Donald J trump. There are so many lags that I can’t fix. This all just a wast of time. !!!DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!

attributes.title: The worst app ever !!!
